abstract: Treasury officials discussed new financial regulations with dozens of finance industry executives and lobbyists from banks, asset management firms and trade groups in February, government records show.
snippet: Treasury officials discussed new financial regulations with dozens of finance industry executives and lobbyists from banks, asset management firms and trade groups in February, government records show.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street has plenty to say about the Dodd-Frank Act, and the Treasury Department is listening.

headline.main: Wall Street Lobbies Treasury on Dodd-Frank

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

abstract: “Wachovia caused significant losses to the Zuni Indians and other investors by violating basic investor protection rules,” the S.E.C.’s top enforcer said.
snippet: “Wachovia caused significant losses to the Zuni Indians and other investors by violating basic investor protection rules,” the S.E.C.’s top enforcer said.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Even as Wall Street churned out mortgage-backed securities and derivatives in 2006, the sellers of the often-convoluted packages sometimes knew that parts of the deals — namely those that they could not sell — were worth far less than face value.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Settles Case Originating At Wachovia
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Settles Case Originating At Wachovia
